name: Carlo PATO
description:
Your brother had a great idea to make life on the lake more interesting, but everyone dismissed it.

It's your mission to try and stop him from doing something crazy! Good luck!

features:

  • 7 bosses
  • 7 scenarios
  • Many different skins
  • DUCK

Instructions:

Arrow Keys / WASD = Move

Arrow Up / Space / W = Jump

X / E / L = Shoot (only during boss fights)

tab = Fullscreen

esc = Leave the level or the game
